content:
I'll create a new report based on the execution logs provided:

EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining System at (41, -85)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (41, -85) extracting coal
- Burner inserter (42.5, -83.5) moving coal from drill to chest
- Wooden chest (43.5, -83.5) storing coal

### Iron Plate Production System 1 at (-20, -54)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (-20, -54) mining iron ore
- Stone furnace (-19, -52) smelting iron plates
Note: Output is currently blocked due to missing inserter

### Iron Plate Production System 2 at (-14, -56)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (-14, -56) mining iron ore
- Stone furnace (-13, -54) smelting iron plates
Note: Output is currently blocked due to missing inserter

ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement Errors
- When placing inserters, ensure there is sufficient space and no existing entities at the target location
- Check for collisions with existing structures before placement
- Consider the entity's size and required clearance when placing near other structures
- When placing entities next to each other, verify the direction and spacing parameters are compatible with the layout

### Resource Management
- Ensure sufficient coal is available in inventory before attempting to insert into entities
- Monitor fuel levels in burner devices to maintain continuous operation

### Structure Design
- Plan the layout of mining-furnace-inserter systems carefully to ensure all components can be properly placed
- Consider the direction and spacing of entities during initial placement to allow for inserters and belts

NAMESPACE

Functions:
- place_entity_next_to(entity_type, reference_pos, spacing, direction): Attempts to place an entity relative to a reference position
- place_entity(entity_type, position): Places an entity at specific coordinates
- insert_item(item_type, target_entity, quantity): Inserts items into an entity
- extract_item(source_entity): Extracts items from an entity

Variables:
- inserter1, inserter2: BurnerInserter
- drill1, drill2: BurnerMiningDrill
- furnace1, furnace2: Furnace

Common failure modes:
- place_entity_next_to: Fails when target position is blocked or invalid
- insert_item: Fails when source inventory lacks required items
- place_entity: Fails when target position is occupied
